- [ ] I have completed the survey `https://airtable.com/shrmuHxu38ZariKJi`
- [ ] My application belongs to:
  - [ ] **Tier 1** ğŸ“–: I added myself to the Year Book.
  - [ ] **Tier 2** âœï¸: I wrote a post on DEV about a project I built.
  - [ ] **Tier 3** âœ¨: I want my project to be highlighted in stream.
